item.title: Conservative activist slams Cracker Barrel; company left reeling after logo redesign
item.description: Conservative activist Robby Starbuck released a scathing critique of Cracker Barrel as the company faces backlash after changing its iconic logo.

item.title: Gianno Caldwell mulls Senate bid as Chicagoans are 'begging for change' on crime woes
item.description: Gianno Caldwell mulls Illinois Senate campaign for Dick Durbin's open seat, focusing on a law-and-order platform after a personal tragedy in Chicago.
